import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Weather=()=>{const[weather,setWeather]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const API_KEY="6b54fd037eff1e25dc501380b0902616";// 
const CITY="Halifax";useEffect(()=>{const fetchWeather=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${CITY}&units=metric&appid=${API_KEY}`);setWeather(response.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching weather:",error);setLoading(false);}};fetchWeather();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-box mt-4 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Current Weather in ",CITY]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading weather..."}):weather?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83C\uDF21\uFE0F ",weather.main.temp,"\xB0C | ",weather.weather[0].description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83D\uDCA8 Wind: ",weather.wind.speed," m/s"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83C\uDF27 Humidity: ",weather.main.humidity,"%"]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Failed to load weather data."})]});};export default Weather;
